results.name: Cotton Shirt
results.info: A shirt is a cloth garment for the upper body (from the neck to the waist).

results.name: White T-Shirt
results.info: A T-shirt, is a style of fabric shirt named after the T shape of its body and sleeves.

results.name: Long Sleeve Shirt
results.info: T-shirts have also become a medium for self-expression and advertising.
